channel.title: Node on TechNotes
channel.description: Recent content in Node on TechNotes

item.title: 解决 Docker 由于node-sass build失败的问题
item.description: 问题描述： 在Mac上通过docker build node.js的镜像失败，由于node-sass安装失败，异常log如下 Module build failed (from ./node_modules/_sass-loader@7.1.0@sass-loader/lib/loader.js): Error: Missing binding /app/node_modules/_node-sass@4.12.0@node-sass/vendor/linux_musl-x64-57/binding.node Node Sass could not find a binding for your current environment: Linux/musl 64-bit with Node.js 8.x Found bindings for the following environments: - OS X 64-bit with Node.js 11.x This usually happens because your environment has changed since running `npm install`. Run `npm rebuild node-sass` to download the binding for your current environment. at module.exports (/app/node_modules/_node-sass@4.12.0@node-sass/lib/binding.js:15:13) at Object.
